name: Mission Concept Review (MCR)
description: Initial review of overall mission concept and feasibility.

name: System Requirements Review (SRR)
description: Verification of top-level system requirements.

name: Mission Definition Review (MDR)
description: Assessment of mission definition and architecture.

name: System Design Review (SDR)
description: Evaluation of high-level system design maturity.

name: Preliminary Design Review (PDR)
description: Review of preliminary subsystem and component designs.

name: Critical Design Review (CDR)
description: Detailed design maturity and readiness for production.

name: Production Readiness Review (PRR)
description: Verification of manufacturing plans and supply readiness.

name: Test Readiness Review (TRR)
description: Assessment of test procedures, hardware, and facilities.

name: Mechanical Integration
description: Assembly and integration of structural and mechanical subsystems.

name: Electrical Integration
description: Integration of electrical harnesses, avionics, and power systems.

name: Functional Testing
description: Comprehensive functional verification of integrated hardware.

name: Environmental Preparation
description: Preparation for environmental testing phases.

name: Vibration Testing
description: Vibe testing to simulate launch loads.

name: Thermal Vacuum (TVAC) Testing
description: Thermal-vacuum testing for space environment verification.

name: EMI/EMC Testing
description: Electromagnetic interference/compatibility verification.

name: Final Functional Testing
description: Last end-to-end functional check before shipment.

name: System Acceptance Review (SAR)
description: Customer acceptance of final integrated system.

name: Pre-Ship Review (PSR)
description: Final logistics and configuration verification before shipping.

name: Packaging & Shipment
description: Packaging and transportation of flight hardware.

name: Operational Readiness Review (ORR)
description: Readiness of ground operations and support teams.

name: Flight Readiness Review (FRR)
description: Final review before launch authorization.

name: Launch
description: Mission launch of the integrated system.
